name: We Took That Trip
storyline: Embark on a relaxing road trip with your closest friends in this laid-back game. Take charge of your beloved van and ensure it stays in top condition by performing regular maintenance and customization as you journey on. As the protagonist, you've developed an eco-friendly device for the car that eliminates the need for any fossil fuels. This innovative device converts trash and discarded objects into fuel. Explore the open road and enjoy the company of your best friends while you make unforgettable memories.
summary: A chill narrative experience through procedural and relaxing landscapes. Appreciate the reunion with your best friends, explore the road and it's fantastic things. Turn the radio on, it's time to enjoy this emotional ride.
